description: One Piece follows Monkey D. Luffy and his pirate crew as they search for the legendary treasure, One Piece, while facing powerful enemies and adventures.
name: One piece

videos.description: Young Luffy sets sail from his hometown, dreaming of becoming King of the Pirates. He quickly encounters trouble with some local pirates.
videos.title: Romance Dawn - The Adventure of Luffy!

videos.description: Luffy meets Koby, a captive forced to do chores for the ruthless pirate, Alvida. He promises to help Koby achieve his dream.
videos.title: Enter the Great Swordsman! Pirate Hunter Zoro Roronoa!

videos.description: Zoro is still tied up, refusing to help Nami and Luffy fight Captain Morgan. Luffy makes a promise he intends to keep.
videos.title: Morgan vs. Luffy! Who's the Weird One?!

videos.description: Zoro's past is revealed as Luffy faces Captain Morgan's tyrannical rule. He aims to free the town and help Zoro join his crew.
videos.title: The Past of Zoro! Kuina's Vow and Luffy's Wish!

videos.description: Zoro is captured and held captive at the Marine base. Luffy confronts Axe-Hand Morgan to free his new crewmate and prove his worth.
videos.title: Dread Power! Captain Morgan vs. Luffy

videos.description: Zoro faces Morgan's henchman. Luffy fights Morgan, leading to a showdown that could decide the town's fate and Nami's true allegiance.
videos.title: "Desperate Situation! Captain Morgan vs. Luffy"

videos.description: Luffy continues his fight with Cabaji. Zoro gets kidnapped and is being threatened by Mohji and Richie the lion.
videos.title: "Grand Battle! Zoro vs. Cabaji the Acrobat!"

videos.description: Nami betrays Luffy and joins Buggy! Zoro is captured, and Luffy must face Buggy's crew alone to save his friend.
videos.title: Nami's Pledge

videos.description: Nami betrays Luffy, and Buggy the Clown wreaks havoc. Zoro faces a deadly fight, while Luffy is trapped in a cage.
videos.title: Honorable Liar? Captain Usopp!

videos.description: Luffy and Zoro battle against Mohji and Richie, and Nami leads Usopp to Kaya's mansion to warn her of Kuro's deadly plot.
videos.title: **"The Weirdest Guy Ever! Jango the Hypnotist"**

videos.description: Nami's betrayal shocks the crew as she steals the Going Merry and heads towards Arlong Park, leaving Luffy and the others confused.
videos.title: Defeat Arlong! Nami's Sorrowful Vow!

videos.description: Zoro is captured! Luffy and Nami must sneak into Buggy's stronghold to rescue him before he faces a deadly public execution.
videos.title: The Legend Begins! Heading for Grand Line

videos.description: Nami leads Luffy and Zoro into a booby-trapped forest controlled by Buggy's crew, hoping to steal their treasure and escape.
videos.title: The Scary Duo! Meowban Brothers vs. Luffy!

videos.description: Nami's betrayal comes to light as she attacks Usopp, stealing the Going Merry. Luffy, Zoro, and Usopp pursue her.
videos.title: Defeat Arlong! Nami's Determination!

videos.description: Zoro is captured! Nami betrays Luffy, and Buggy plans to execute Zoro in front of the entire town.
videos.title: "Defeat Buggy! The Gum-Gum Bazooka!"

videos.description: Usopp's lies become reality! Kaya's life is in danger as Captain Kuro reveals his sinister plan to take over her fortune and the village.
videos.title: "Protect Kaya! The Usopp Pirates' Great Efforts!"

videos.description: Nami's past is revealed as the crew reaches Cocoyasi Village. Luffy confronts Arlong, foreshadowing a fierce battle for the island's freedom.
videos.title: **"Anger Explodes! Arlong, the Evil Man of the Sea!"**

videos.description: Gaimon, a man stuck in a treasure chest, has guarded his island's treasure for twenty years. Luffy's crew learns of his story.
videos.title: You're Weird!! Gaimon and His Wonderful Friends

videos.description: Luffy and Zoro face off against Buggy's crew in Orange Town, while Nami struggles with her past and her allegiance to the Straw Hats.
videos.title: Zoro's Past! Kuina's Oath and Luffy's Dream!

videos.description: Sanji's past is revealed as the Straw Hats continue their journey to the Baratie, a floating restaurant, but trouble arises.
videos.title: Famous Cook! Sanji of the Floating Restaurant

videos.description: Nami's betrayal becomes clear as she steals the Going Merry and sets sail for Arlong Park, leaving the crew shocked and angered.
videos.title: Nami's Betrayal! The Pirate Ship Heist!!

videos.description: Usopp's lies become reality as Captain Kuro's Black Cat Pirates launch their assault on Syrup Village. The Straw Hats must protect Kaya!
videos.title: Protect the Village! The Usopp Pirates Stand Up!

videos.description: Usopp and Kaya's relationship deepens as Kuro's sinister plan begins to unfold. Luffy and the Straw Hats prepare to defend Syrup Village.
videos.title: Protect the Village! Captain Usopp Leads the Straw Hats!

videos.description: Usopp faces his fears, determined to protect Kaya from the Black Cat Pirates. Luffy and Zoro continue their battle against Captain Kuro.
videos.title: Mihawk! Zoro Falls Into the Sea

videos.description: Luffy and Sanji infiltrate the Baratie, facing fierce opposition from its cooks, while Zoro struggles to survive his duel with Mihawk.
videos.title: The Ultimate Deadly Skill! Sanji vs. Full-Course Zeff!

videos.description: Luffy and Zoro face Mihawk, the world's greatest swordsman. Zoro challenges him, resulting in a devastating defeat that tests Zoro's resolve.
videos.title: Krieg's Fleet Annihilation!

videos.description: Luffy and Zoro struggle against the hypnotic powers of Jango, while Usopp desperately tries to wake Kaya before Kuro arrives.
videos.title: **Usopp Must Protect!**

videos.description: Nami falls ill! Luffy and Sanji venture to find a doctor, landing them in a village plagued by a mysterious, deadly disease.
videos.title: I Won't Die!

videos.description: Usopp's plan to fix the Going Merry is put into action, while the crew faces the eccentric Gaimon, a man stuck in a treasure chest.
videos.title: Don't Get Me Wrong! Usopp's Determination

videos.description: Zoro faces a deadly dilemma against Mihawk, while Luffy struggles to even land a blow. An impossible challenge looms.
videos.title: **Zoro's Desperate Gamble!**

videos.description: Usopp's past is revealed as Kaya's illness worsens. The Straw Hats desperately fight to protect her from the evil Captain Kuro.
videos.title: The Truth! Kaya, the Girl Who Carried Illness!

videos.description: Usopp's past is revealed as Kaya's life is threatened. The Straw Hats must defend her from Captain Kuro's deadly Black Cat Pirates.
videos.title: The Witch of Syrup Village

videos.description: Usopp's lies become reality as Kaya's life is in danger! The Straw Hats must face the Black Cat Pirates to save Syrup Village.
videos.title: Usopp's Pirates?!

videos.description: Usopp faces his fears and confronts Jango. Zoro struggles against hypnosis, while Luffy is trapped by Kuro's sinister strategy.
videos.title: Kaya is in Danger! Usopp, the Captain's Relentless Fight!

videos.description: Nami's betrayal becomes clear as she attacks Usopp, revealing her alliance with Arlong and his fish-men pirates.
videos.title: Surviving! Mama Bellemere and Nami's Bond!

videos.description: Nami's betrayal is revealed! Luffy confronts Arlong, while Usopp and Zoro face their own deadly battles against Arlong's crew.
videos.title: Luffy Rises! Result of Broken Promise!

videos.description: Zoro struggles against the Fish-Men as Nami's past and connection to Arlong are revealed, showcasing her desperation and trauma.
videos.title: Luffy in Trouble! Fishmen vs. the Luffy Pirates

videos.description: Zoro confronts Mihawk, the world's greatest swordsman, in a desperate battle to prove his strength, but faces overwhelming odds and devastating defeat.
videos.title: Zoro Falls! Mihawk's Terrifying Power!

videos.description: Usopp's past is revealed as the Straw Hats finally arrive at Syrup Village, facing Captain Kuro's treacherous plans for Kaya's inheritance.
videos.title: For Whose Sake? The Ambition of Captain Usopp!

videos.description: Zoro battles the formidable Mr. 1, struggling against his steel body. Nami and Usopp face Miss Doublefinger's attacks amidst chaos.
videos.title: Aim for Victory! The Power of the Desert!

videos.description: Luffy and the crew battle Wapol and his lackeys in Drum Kingdom, struggling to protect Dr. Kureha and Nami's fragile health.
videos.title: Wapol's Appetite! Luffy's Eat-Eat Cannon!

videos.description: Sanji faces his past as the Straw Hats encounter the Baratie's bizarre owner, Chef Zeff, leading to a cooking duel.
videos.title: Sanji's Past

videos.description: Zoro faces Mihawk, the world's strongest swordsman, in a desperate duel. Luffy and the others can only watch, fearing for their friend's life.
videos.title: "Zoro's Ambition! The Name of the World's Strongest Swordsman!"

videos.description: Nami's past is revealed as Luffy battles Arlong, whose dominance over Cocoyasi Village is absolute. The villagers rally together, determined to fight.
videos.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive

videos.description: Buggy's crew and Luffy's team face off in an all-out battle for Nami and the treasure map, leading to chaotic clashes and surprising alliances.
videos.title: You Are the One We've Been Waiting For! Buggy's Plan

videos.description: Luffy faces off against Buggy the Clown in Loguetown, while Smoker and his Marines pursue the Straw Hats, threatening their escape.
videos.title: The Town of Beginnings and Endings - Loguetown

videos.description: Luffy and Zoro face Mihawk, the world's greatest swordsman. Zoro is utterly defeated, but his display of honor impresses Mihawk.
videos.title: "Sandai Kitetsu" and "Yubashiri"! Zoro's New Swords and Sergeant Major vs. Sergeant Major!

description: Solo Leveling follows Sung Jinwoo, the weakest hunter, as he gains the power to level up and uncovers world-shattering secrets.
name: Solo leveling

videos.description: Jinwoo faces a formidable new foe in a dungeon, pushing his skills and shadow army to their limits. A mysterious hunter observes.
videos.title: I've Got a Bad Feeling

videos.description: Sung Jinwoo, now the world's strongest hunter, faces new challenges as powerful enemies emerge, threatening global stability and his own existence.
videos.title: Instant Death

videos.description: Jinwoo faces a formidable new foe in a dungeon, pushing his abilities to their limit. His hunter rank is threatened.
videos.title: Evolving Threat

videos.description: Jinwoo faces a formidable new foe in a dungeon, pushing his skills and shadow army to their absolute limit in a desperate battle.
videos.title: A Rank Reassessment

videos.description: Jinwoo faces new challenges in the Demon Castle, pushing his abilities further as he confronts increasingly powerful foes and a mysterious presence.
videos.title: If I Had One More Chance

description: Attack on Titan follows Eren Yeager as he battles Titans and uncovers secrets, aiming to protect humanity and uncover the truth.
name: Attack Titan

videos.description: For a century, humanity has lived in peace behind walls. But that peace is shattered when a colossal Titan breaches Wall Maria.
videos.title: To You, in 2000 Years: The Fall of Shiganshina, Part 1

videos.description: Chaos erupts as Titans breach Wall Maria. Eren witnesses unspeakable horrors and vows revenge, fueling his burning desire to join the Survey Corps.
videos.title: That Day

videos.description: Following the Colossal Titan's reappearance, Eren vows revenge, joining the Scout Regiment despite Mikasa and Armin's concerns for his safety.
videos.title: A Dim Light Amid Despair

videos.description: After a brutal training exercise, Eren and his fellow cadets grapple with the grim realities of their future fighting Titans.
videos.title: The Night of the Graduation Ceremony

videos.description: As the Titans breach Wall Rose, the remaining cadets struggle to regroup and face the overwhelming terror, desperately trying to survive the onslaught.
videos.title: First Battle

videos.description: As the cadets regroup, Eren's fate is revealed, sparking disbelief and uncertainty among the survivors. Commander Pyxis makes a crucial decision.
videos.title: The World the Girl Saw

videos.description: During training, Eren faces difficulties mastering the 3D Maneuver Gear, struggling to maintain his balance and provoking concern from his superiors.
videos.title: Small Blade

videos.description: Eren struggles to control his Titan form, endangering Mikasa and Armin. The Garrison Regiment questions his existence and considers him a threat.
videos.title: I Can Hear His Heartbeat

videos.description: As Eren struggles within the Titan's belly, a flashback reveals his father's grim experiment and the key to unlocking Eren's Titan powers.
videos.title: Whereabouts of His Left Arm

videos.description: The remaining cadets struggle to hold off the Titans. Mikasa's strategic brilliance shines as Armin confronts his crippling self-doubt in a desperate moment.
videos.title: Whereabouts of His Left Arm

videos.description: As the Scout Regiment struggles against the Female Titan, Armin pieces together her identity, leading to a desperate confrontation and a shocking revelation.
videos.title: Idol: The Struggle for Trost, Part 5

videos.description: With Eren's titan form rampaging, Armin desperately tries to reason with him, hoping to use his power to humanity's advantage against the other titans.
videos.title: Heartbeat

videos.description: Eren struggles to control his Titan powers during a crucial battle to reclaim Trost. Armin's quick thinking might be their only hope.
videos.title: Primal Desire

videos.description: Eren undergoes brutal training, struggling to control his Titan form. Meanwhile, a desperate plan to reseal Wall Maria is formulated.
videos.title: Still Can't See: Eve of the Counterattack, 2

videos.description: As the Female Titan wreaks havoc, Armin deduces her identity. Eren, hesitant to fight a former comrade, is forced to make a choice.
videos.title: Soldier

videos.description: The Female Titan rampages, Eren's squad faces annihilation. Mikasa confronts her past, while Armin desperately tries to deduce the Titan's identity.
videos.title: Female Titan: The 57th Exterior Scouting Mission, Part 1

videos.description: The Scout Regiment suffers heavy losses as they desperately fight to escape the Female Titan's relentless pursuit in the Titan Forest.
videos.title: Forest of Giant Trees: The 57th Expedition Beyond the Walls, Part 2

videos.description: Eren faces a daunting choice, caught between Titans and humanity. Annie's secrets begin to unravel, leading to a desperate confrontation.
videos.title: Erwin Smith: Judgment

videos.description: As the Female Titan rampages, Armin pieces together her identity, forcing a desperate confrontation within the Stohess District to expose her.
videos.title: Crushing Blow: The 57th Exterior Scouting Mission, Part 5

videos.description: Facing a relentless female Titan, Eren's squad suffers devastating losses, pushing him to question his abilities and purpose.
videos.title: The Defeated

videos.description: The Female Titan is finally captured, but Annie's identity reveal raises more questions than answers. A desperate gamble is made.
videos.title: Smile

videos.description: Eren faces Annie in a brutal battle within Stohess District. The Female Titan's identity is revealed, forcing a desperate confrontation.
videos.title: Mercy: Raid on Stohess District, Part 2

videos.description: As the Colossal and Armored Titans' attack aftermath is assessed, a chilling discovery rocks the Scout Regiment: Titans are inside Wall Rose.
videos.title: Beast Titan

videos.description: As the Scouts regroup, a terrifying new Titan appears within Wall Rose, leaving everyone scrambling to uncover its origins and purpose.
videos.title: I'm Home

videos.description: Nanaba's squad desperately battles the Titans at Utgard Castle, uncovering a shocking truth about the monsters' origins and abilities in the night.
videos.title: Soldiers' Dance

videos.description: Ymir's past is revealed as she fights alongside Krista against overwhelming Titan forces, showcasing a hidden power within.
videos.title: Soldier

videos.description: As the Scouts investigate Wall Rose, Connie returns to his village, finding it deserted and hinting at a terrifying secret.
videos.title: Warrior

videos.description: Ymir's shocking past is revealed as she battles for Krista, forcing her to make a difficult choice amidst the chaos and titan onslaught.
videos.title: Close Combat

videos.description: As night falls, Ymir's past is revealed as she, Christa, and others are trapped within Utgard Castle, surrounded by Titans.
videos.title: Historia

videos.description: As the Armored and Colossal Titans escape, Eren and Mikasa struggle, triggering a shocking memory within Eren, unlocking a mysterious power.
videos.title: The Hunters

videos.description: Ymir's past is revealed as she fights alongside Reiner and Bertholdt against the incoming Titan horde, questioning her loyalties.
videos.title: Opening

videos.description: Ymir's shocking transformation and past are revealed as the Scouts are trapped within Utgard Castle, facing a horde of titans at night.
videos.title: Children

videos.description: The Scouts face overwhelming odds as titans swarm, forcing Eren to make a critical decision with devastating consequences. Hope dwindles.
videos.title: Scream

videos.description: Ymir's shocking past is revealed as she fights alongside Eren against the Armored and Colossal Titans, forcing a desperate choice.
videos.title: Charge

name: Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian
